Module dev.kkorolyov.flopple
Package dev.kkorolyov.flopple.function.convert

Class ConverterChain<T,​R>

java.lang.Object
dev.kkorolyov.flopple.function.convert.ConverterChain<T,​R>
Type Parameters:
T - input type
R - output type
All Implemented Interfaces:
Converter<T,​R>
public final class ConverterChain<T,​R>
extends java.lang.Object
implements Converter<T,​R>
A sequence of Converter calls. Useful for generating a converter A -> D using converters [A -> B, B -> C, C -> D]
